thread.title: Now is the Time to See What’s New at On Top of the World...
thread.title_full: Now is the Time to See What’s New at On Top of the World... | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: On Top of the World
title: Now is the Time to See What’s New at On Top of the World...
text:
If you haven’t been to On Top of the World, an amenity-rich, Central Florida golf course community, then you haven’t seen what’s new and exciting about it. When you visit On Top of the World, you will not only tour all new models and move-in ready homes, but see all of the new floor plan designs and homesites that have just been released, and see all of the new, exciting features and pricing available. The time to visit is now to take advantage of everything that is new at On Top of the World.
See for yourself why On Top of the World is voted one of Where to Retire’s 50 best master-planned communities in the U.S. Come tour the 10 decorated models and the move-in ready homes, which all feature flexible floorplans, luxury features and energy efficiency that exceed ENERGY STARTM standards. Additionally, the estate homes include gourmet kitchens, guest suites, oversized lanai areas and three-car garages. All home designs feature quality fixtures and finishes, open living areas and volume ceilings, and must be seen to be appreciated. These luxury estate homes are available on oversized homesites, many with golf or preserve views.
All home designs feature quality fixtures and finishes, open living areas and volume ceilings. At On Top of the World you experience unparalleled convenience with a selection of move-in ready homes available right now. With a limited selection of move-in ready homes available, now is your chance to start living the lifestyle you have been looking for, so move fast or miss out. Plus, when you buy now, you can get up to $5,000 in “choice bucks” to use towards beautiful upgrades and desirable options.
Here is your chance to experience everything On Top of the World has to offer and get a little taste of the great lifestyle, with the World Tour Adventure. Now, for a limited time only, you can take advantage of a world tour special, and spend three days and two nights in a beautifully furnished two-bedroom villa with all of the comforts of home for only $99! You will have the opportunity to tour the community and meet with our knowledgeable staff and friendly resident diplomats, so they can explain first hand how moving to On Top of the World changed their lives. To truly enjoy your experience, On Top of the World will provide you with your very own golf cart during your stay so that you can explore the expansive community on wheels.
In fact, there are over 250,000 square feet of amenities to see, including 54 holes of golf; indoor and outdoor swimming pools; tennis and pickleball courts; a 14-acre R/C flying field; bocce, racquetball and basketball courts; health club and spa; restaurants, cultural venues and more. With over 200 clubs, leagues, hobbies and learning opportunities at the award-winning Master the Possibilities Life-Long Learning Center, residents can choose to be as busy or as unhurried as they please.
Luxury estate homes on oversized homesites start from the $240,000s to $300,000s. There are also maintenance free single-family homes available from the $170,000s. Make sure to tour the 10 new decorated models as well as the move-in ready homes and ask about homes ready for immediate occupancy. For more information, call 1-855-503-9990 or visit www.OnTopOfTheWorld.com.
FOR MORE INFORMATION
Call: 1-855-503-9990
Website: www.ontopoftheworld.com
</p
